Module deliverif.app
Package deliverif.app.model.graph

Class Graph

java.lang.Object
deliverif.app.model.graph.Graph
public class Graph
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a Graph composed of Vertexes and Edges

    • addEdge

      public void addEdge​(java.lang.Long source, java.lang.Long dest, float cost)
      Add a bidirectional edge ( source, dest, cost ) to the graph.
      Parameters:
      source - id of the source vertex of the new edge
      dest - id of the destination vertex of the new edge
      cost - cost of the new edge

    • addVertex

      public void addVertex​(Vertex v)
      Add a vertex with the given name to the Graph, and return its internal number as an Integer.This involves adding entries to the Hashtable and vertex Vector. PRE: vertexName is not already in the Graph
      Parameters:
      v - the vertex to add
